PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Zstack_Fixed.label: PAmCherry with EGFP (Fixed)
PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Zstack_Fixed.description: Two-Color Widefield Microscopy of a RodCell with PAmCherry and EGFP as molecules. Cell is fixed and the experiment protocol is a Z-Stack.

PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Zstack_Live.label: PAmCherry with EGFP (Live)
PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Zstack_Live.description: Two-Color Widefield Microscopy of a RodCell with PAmCherry and EGFP as molecules. Cell is live (with motion described by bounded FBM models (differently for each molecule) and the experiment protocol is a Z-Stack.

PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Timeseries_Live.label: PAmCherry with EGFP (Live timeseries)
PAmCherry_EGFP_Widefield_Timeseries_Live.description: Two-Color Widefield Microscopy of a RodCell with PAmCherry and EGFP as molecules. Cell is live (with motion described by bounded FBM models (differently for each molecule) and the experiment protocol is a time-series.
